java/liquibase/database/DatabaseFactory.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00004 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00005 
00006 import java.sql.Connection;
00007 import java.sql.SQLException;
00008 import java.util.ArrayList;
00009 import java.util.Arrays;
00010 import java.util.List;
00011 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00012 
00013 public class DatabaseFactory {
00014 
00015     private static DatabaseFactory instance = new DatabaseFactory();
00016 
00017     private static final Logger log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00018 
00019     private List<Database> implementedDatabases = new ArrayList<Database>(Arrays.asList(
00020             (Database) new OracleDatabase(),
00021             new PostgresDatabase(),
00022             new MSSQLDatabase(),
00023             new MySQLDatabase(),
00024             new DerbyDatabase(),
00025             new HsqlDatabase(),
00026             new DB2Database(),
00027             new SybaseDatabase(),
00028             new H2Database(),
00029             new CacheDatabase(),
00030             new FirebirdDatabase(),
00031             new MaxDBDatabase(),
00032             new SQLiteDatabase()
00033     ));
00034 
00035     private DatabaseFactory() {
00036     }
00037 
00038     public static DatabaseFactory getInstance() {
00039         return instance;
00040     }
00041 
00045     public List<Database> getImplementedDatabases() {
00046         return implementedDatabases;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public void addDatabaseImplementation(Database database) {
00050         implementedDatabases.add(0, database);
00051     }
00052 
00053     public Database findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection connection) throws JDBCException {
00054         Database database = null;
00055 
00056         boolean foundImplementation = false;
00057 
00058         for (Database implementedDatabase : getImplementedDatabases()) {
00059             database = implementedDatabase;
00060             if (database.isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection)) {
00061                 foundImplementation = true;
00062                 break;
00063             }
00064         }
00065 
00066         if (!foundImplementation) {
00067             try {
00068                 log.warning("Unknown database: " + connection.getMetaData().getDatabaseProductName());
00069             } catch (SQLException e) {
00070                 throw new JDBCException(e);
00071             }
00072             database = new UnsupportedDatabase();
00073         }
00074 
00075         Database returnDatabase;
00076         try {
00077             returnDatabase = database.getClass().newInstance();
00078         } catch (Exception e) {
00079             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00080         }
00081         returnDatabase.setConnection(connection);
00082         return returnDatabase;
00083     }
00084 
00085     public Database findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(DatabaseConnection connection) throws JDBCException {
00086         return findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection.getUnderlyingConnection());
00087     }
00088 
00089     public String findDefaultDriver(String url) {
00090         for (Database database : this.getImplementedDatabases()) {
00091             String defaultDriver = database.getDefaultDriver(url);
00092             if (defaultDriver != null) {
00093                 return defaultDriver;
00094             }
00095         }
00096 
00097         return null;
00098     }
00099 
00100 
00101 }
